name: Windows 10 App Upload Bundle
summary: An MSIXUPLOAD file is an app package that is used for uploading Windows 10 apps to the Microsoft Store. The package contains one or more versions of the app, each of which is built for a specific computer architecture (x86, x64, or ARM). In addition, the package can contain a symbol file that allows developers to analyze app performance after the app is installed on user computers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
